Title: Is it Time to Declare Music Downloads a Loss Leader?

Author: scooter53080
Content: The third example on the type safety slides bugs me (using the type safe comparison operator to prevent both a boolean true and non-zero int evaluating the same.)  I would prefer use of a consistent return type from the function to begin with.  I guess since some built in php functions behave this way, it's important to know/use...but I don't think I would recommend writing a function such that the type safe equal check is necessary.

Author: corentin
Content: This is pure speculation. Moreover, business isn't war and companies don't "hate" each other; they just happen to be in competition on some markets.
